Name: PixelGround
About the game: The world's first large-scale battle survival battle has begun. Survive the survival stage where up to 40 people fight at the same time. Key features Survive the survival battle involving fighters from all over the world. - Enjoy fighting survival mode using various characters. - In survival mode, various stages are randomly conducted. - Survive high rankings in survival mode to earn rewards and show off your fighting skills. - Customize your own character by purchasing items with the currency obtained in the game. - In addition to survival mode, you can also enjoy 1 VS 1 battle and 3 VS 3 tag match battle modes.
